headline: Trump Regrets Not Marching To Capitol On Jan. 6, Blames Pelosi For Violence
author: Marita Vlachou
sentences: In the interview, Trump also defended Supreme Court Justice Clarence Thomas’ wife Ginni, who sent nearly two dozen texts to then-White House chief of staff Mark Meadows urging him to overturn the 2020 election, according to copies reviewed by The Washington Post and CBS News.
